item.title: 2011 Taiwan php conference – CodeIgniter Framework
item.author: appleboy.tw@gmail.com (Appleboy)
item.description: 今年第1屆舉辦 2011 PHP Conference，終於有機會去台北推廣 CodeIgniter，底下是我這一次的簡報，歡迎大家參考 Phpconf 2011 introduction_to_codeigniter <div style="padding:5px 0 12px"> View more <a href="http://www.slideshare.net/" target="_blank">presentations</a> from <a href="http://www.slideshare.net/appleboy" target="_blank">Wu Bo-Yi</a> </div>
